entry.tran: 折价贴换交易；以旧换新交易
entry.def: A trade-in is an arrangement in which someone buys something such as a new car or washing machine at a reduced price by giving their old one, as well as money, in payment.

example.tran: 这辆车的折价贴换交易价值

means.word_mean: 1. an item of property that is given in part payment for a new one
